result.arabic_text: يَوۡمَ يُكۡشَفُ عَن سَاقٖ وَيُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ
result.translation: Ku musi hazoba hari intureka z’akataraboneka, maze Imana Allah Igaseruka gutunganiriza ibiremwa, Igaheza Ikagaragaza umurundi wayo mutagatifu[3] utagira na kimwe bisa mu biremwa, maze ibiremwa bigahamagarirwa kwubamira Uhoraho Allah, ibiremwa bitigeze vyubamira Imana Allah kw'isi, nta vyo bizoshobora ngo vyubame;
result.footnotes: [3] Intumwa y’Imana (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah) yaravuze iti: “Imana yacu Rurema Allah Izogaragaza umurundi wayo, maze umwemeramana wese mu bagabo no mu bagore ace ayubamira, hasigare uwahora ayubamira kw’isi ku kwiyerekana no kuyagwa neza; agize ngo yubame, umugongo wiwe uzoca ucika igihimba kimwe kitagondeka”. Yashikirijwe na Al-Bukhariy na Muslimu.
